@liesandarbor
feeling generous? hit a couple bucks on my ko-fi

summary: do you think that jon might somehow have an encounter with lyanna like harry had with lily?
question: do you think that jon might somehow have an encounter with lyanna like harry had with lily?
answer:
Lily’s smile was the widest of all. She pushed her long hair back as she drew closer to him, and her green eyes, so like his, searched his face hungrily, as though she would never be able to look at him enough. 

“You’ve been so brave.”

He could not speak.  His eyes feasted on her, and he thought that he would like to stand and look at her forever, and that would be enough.

I have definitely thought about this before; whether it’s a vision from the weirwood, or even a dream.  Thematically, it’s a perfect fit: the orphaned hero of the story who never asked for this cup to pass to him, finding out before he faces his fate that he always belonged.

Not my mother, Jon thought stubbornly. He knew nothing of his mother; Eddard Stark would not talk of her. Yet he dreamed of her at times, so often that he could almost see her face. In his dreams, she was beautiful, and highborn, and her eyes were kind.

Overall, I think he’ll have a strong chance, whether through Bran or even Melisandre, for this to be a possibility, and I would love to see it.

summary:
theres been a lot of negativity re: arya/jons reunion lately so i thought i’d bring this little spoiler back: 



We last saw...
body:
theres been a lot of negativity re: arya/jons reunion lately so i thought i’d bring this little spoiler back:

We last saw the crypt of Winterfell in The Spoils of War, when Sansa and Arya reunited in front of their late father’s new statue. According to our sources, at least the first two episodes of season eight will see the return of this hallowed site, which is filmed on-location at Shane’s Castle. In fact, we may return to a similar kind of scene: reportedly, in the one to be shot today and tomorrow, two main characters discuss Ned’s death. Yesterday, Shane’s Castle also housed two starring cast members. Rather ominously, their scene ends with a horn being blown. Let’s hope it doesn’t blow three times! [x]

now this is just speculation but its very possible (likely?) this is an arya/jon scene (maisie and kit were both filming at the time) and if the topic is ned it only makes that its starklings. this could very well be a scene where arya comforts jon in light of his “true” parentage being revealed. they will discuss ned, r+l=j and how no matter what jon will always be arya’s brother.

summary: Hello, How do you think Jon Connington would treat Jon Snow if he was the one choosen to raise him. I asked Riana-one and she...
question: Hello, How do you think Jon Connington would treat Jon Snow if he was the one choosen to raise him. I asked Riana-one and she thinks that Snow will get a very heavy academic workload and will receive a bunch of classism and negative comparisons to Lyanna. Then he would go to the Faith or Citadel. I very much doubt Connington would treat Rhaenys or Jon anywhere near as well as Aegon. They both resemble their mothers rather than Rhaegar and Rhaenys is female while Snow is a bastard. Thanks.
answer: Given that JonC is doing all of this for Rhaegar, I doubt he’d be as motivated to raise Jon right as Aegon or even Rhaenys. After all if it hadn’t been for Lyanna and Elia, Rhaegar would still be alive. I think JonC would be distant to Jon as much as possible, he’d feel more like a teacher than a guardian. If Aegon was there, then Jon would have to understand that he comes to second to the heir of the throne. All of this depends on whether or not JonC considers Jon to be legitimate, putting a bastard on the throne is very difficult, esp one whose conception started a civil war. It’s possible that JonC will still try to help Jon because Rhaegar is his father just like it’s possible that he would want nothing to do with Jon. If Aegon is alive, then Jon will be considered a threat to Rhaegar’s trueborn son.

summary:
Stay Awhile
Chapter Four: Rubrik’s Cube
She tried to retreat into a small corner, wheeling both her and Val’s bags behind her,...
body:
Stay Awhile

Chapter Four: Rubrik’s Cube

She tried to retreat into a small corner, wheeling both her and Val’s bags behind her, to avoid the mayhem and to get out of the way. But a shadow followed her, tapping her on the shoulder when she finally found a quiet spot to sit by the window to watch the snow fall outside.

“Hey,” Jon greeted and gestured to the bags she was lugging around, “need help carrying those to your room?”

She thought he looked rather dour for someone who was able to sit next to the girl he wanted.

“I think I can manage,” she told him, but at seeing how his face fell briefly at her bluntness, she quickly added, “but thank you. They’re not that heavy, and Val is coming back soon with our key card.”

“Do you know which room yet?” He asked, taking a seat beside her. “I’m only sharing a room with Sam on the third floor. Swing by later with Val to hang out, maybe?”

You want me and not Ygritte?

Pushing away her surprise and desire to immediately say yes, Dany opened up her backpack to reveal the novels she brought along. Her plan was to keep herself as occupied as possible this weekend, even if it means catching up with school work. “Think I’m pretty set for this weekend.”

Jon only blinked at seeing all the books. “Can you spare a moment to talk this weekend at all?”

Chapter Four is now up on AO3!

You want me and not Ygritte?

Pushing away her surprise and desire to immediately say yes, Dany opened up her backpack to reveal the novels she brought along. Her plan was to keep herself as occupied as possible this weekend, even if it means catching up with school work. “Think I’m pretty set for this weekend.”

Jon only blinked at seeing all the books. “Can you spare a moment to talk this weekend at all?”

Chapter Four is now up on AO3!

tags: davos definitely cried when they offered
title: S8 Wishlist 27/?
body:
*after all the fighting is done*

Jon: Ser Davos, I hope you’ll come to King’s Landing. Lord Tyrion may be the Queen’s Hand, but I still have need for you.

Davos: *embarrassed* That’s very kind of you, Your Grace, but I’ve already promised to go the Storm Lands with Gendry and Lady Arya.

Jon: What? Why? Would you really rather be a lord’s right-hand man than a king’s?

Davos: Not particularly, no, but they made a … different offer.

Arya: We told him we’ll start having children soon enough, and he can be their grandfather.

Jon:

Davos: They get me.

tags: my cousin loves Jon Snow and Kit Harington
summary: My cousin loves Jon Snow.  My cousin doesn't watch Game of Thrones and wouldn't be allowed to.  She loves Kit Harington and Jon...
body:
My cousin loves Jon Snow. My cousin doesn’t watch Game of Thrones and wouldn’t be allowed to. She loves Kit Harington and Jon Snow. She ships Jonerys.

She even sent red hearts for Daenerys and blue ones for Jon. She doesn’t even know that much about the series and neither of us have read the books. She wouldn’t be allowed to. I did not see that text coming. But she loves Jon Snow.

reblog.comment:
